data.author: k-chaney
data.message:
Initial changes for ERC

The event rate controller is new in gen 4 sensors. It throttles the
number of events coming out of the camera. The exact implementation is
unknown and not straight forward (it impacts the events below that event
rate). From testing it appears that this rate is the target upper limit.

- erc_mode - the mode of the controller - enabled, disabled, or na (for
if you have an old sensor)
- erc_rate - the rate at which the controller should throttle

data.author: k-chaney
data.message:
Add more documentation for triggers

README now provides more explanation of the triggering system, how to
setup a new camera model, and provides links to supporting documentation
from Prophesee and CenturyArks.

Signed-off: Kenneth Chaney

data.author: Bernd Pfrommer
data.message: Merge branch 'chaneyk/special_events'

data.author: Bernd Pfrommer
data.message: better handling of parameter modification at runtime

data.author: k-chaney
data.message:
External trigger pin support

Starts to add support for external trigger pins.

- metavision_wrapper pulls in a configuration template for the trigger
  setup and executes based on the hardware templates available. These
  trigger events are linked to a callback for these events.
- driver_ros1 passes in the configurations for the triggers and
  publishes events to a new topic with a new encoding type.
- README starts to reflect the changes in parameter options
- config/trigger_pins.yaml contains the pin mappings for silkyevcam
  along with the officially listed pin mappings from the metavision hal
  examples.

Signed-off-by: Kenneth Chaney
